name: Tower Tactics
description:
Welcome to my game!

Tower Tactics is a board strategy game where you can play in turns against a computer. The objective is to install towers on the field, but you have to obey some simple rules.

Use your cards to install the towers. Your towers can prevent the enemy to install towers too and vice versa. You have to be wise when choosing the right card to put down.

This is just a prototype, so you may find bugs. Please leave your feedback in the form found in the game.

(Play in fullscreen to have better experience)
